targets.expr: max(jvm{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}) by (runtime, vendor, version) or max(jvm_info{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}) by (runtime, vendor, version) or max(jvm{app=~"$app", region=~"$region", instance=~"$instance"}) by (runtime, vendor, version) or max(jvm_info{app=~"$app", region=~"$region", instance=~"$instance"}) by (runtime, vendor, version)
max(sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod", area="heap"}) by (pod) / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod", area="heap"}) by (pod))

max(sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app=~"$app", region=~"$region", instance=~"$instance", area="heap"}) by (instance) / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app=~"$app", region=~"$region", instance=~"$instance", area="heap"}) by (instance))

max(sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod", area="nonheap"}) by (pod) / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod", area="nonheap", id!="Compressed Class Space"}) by (pod))

max(sum(jvm_memory_used_bytes{app=~"$app", region=~"$region", instance=~"$instance", area="nonheap"}) by (instance) / sum(jvm_memory_max_bytes{app=~"$app", region=~"$region", instance=~"$instance", area="nonheap", id!="Compressed Class Space"}) by (instance))

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod", status=~"5.."}[5m])) by (status) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (status)

sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", region=~"$region", instance=~"$instance", status=~"5.."}[5m])) by (status) / sum(rate(http_server_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", region=~"$region", instance=~"$instance"}[5m])) by (status)

sum(rate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod", status=~"5.."}[5m])) by (status) / sum(rate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", cluster=~"$cluster", pod=~"$pod"}[5m])) by (status)

sum(rate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", region=~"$region", instance=~"$instance", status=~"5.."}[5m])) by (status) / sum(rate(http_client_requests_seconds_count{app=~"$app", region=~"$region", instance=~"$instance"}[5m])) by (status)
